TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but he still sings because he wants to.

I wish for something in a nothing.

Granted. That something is a nothing. So you got more nothing! Ha!

I wish i had a cool exo-skeleton.

Granted, but it can be easily penetrated by a touch.

I wish I had nothing in a something.

Granted, but the nothing is a rift in the fabric of reality and it consumes all possible universes.

I wish to control the flow of time.

Granted but you don't know how to control it and get yourself stuck in the Middle Ages.

I wish I could fly a space shuttle

(Don't just say it crashes )

Granted, but it explodes.

I wish for timezones not being a thing.

Granted. Times zones are not physical, but they still are strongly embedded in every human that will ever exist.

I wish I had a cute little drone made out of a xbox one, a air conditioner and a hang glider.

Granted. You cannot legally program the drone, and it is used by XBox Man to advertise air conditioning.

I wish for xboxes to be replaced by boxes containing alien monsters.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Granted. You do not live on Kerbin. When you try out the rocket propelled grenade, the laser guide is theoretically infinitely powerful.

The universe explodes from infinite energy being expelled.

I wish for a time.

*Error 401* Requested object does not exist.

I wish for a hypersonic monorail from Switzerland to Mexico.

Granted. It derails midway over the Atlantic ocean with you on it. You soon learn how "un-fun" hitting the water at hypersonic speeds it.

I wish for a personal space elevator.

granted, due to poor placement, it breaks apart causing mass destruction

i wish that my memory didn't suck

You forgot your wish mid-sentence, and your memory was made worse.

I want some more skittles.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Granted. He becomes a star (the big, flaming kind) and enters your home as you are making a video. The next day the newspaper headlines read: "Youtuber died fiery death when a star broke into his home. The video went viral."

I wish Scott Manley became human again.

Granted. He dies of time dilation.

I wish for a chocolate unfactory.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Granted, but a human sacrifice is needed in the process. Someone with the name of LVL 9001 is the lucky human who is chosen! and Scott Manley is brought back as a baby.

I wish Scott Manley was back to his current age.

Granted, hes still a baby

I wish for world peace

Granted. World War III occurs, wipes everyone out, and then world peace occurs.

I wish i could sometimes stop time to think ._.

Granted, but you don't know how to start it again.

I wish I could switch between species, gender and ethnicity on a whim.

Granted, but once you change, your mind changes accordingly and you forget that you could change!

I wish i was master of space & time!

You are master of space and time in the second dimension! Yay!

I wish I had a majestic emerald green top hat with a fitting tuxedo suit.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001
